tweets.text:
Here‚Äôs the team in action tracing anyone flushing wet wipes! üí™

It might seem a bit OTT but if you saw the harm that wipes can cause to homes, communities & the environment then you‚Äôd understand why we have a dedicated #BinTheWipe team.

Read more: https://t.co/9Qx3iKb0Dd https://t.co/txGuiFO7tw
Have you signed up to receive flood alerts? Heavy rain is likely overnight, we‚Äôll issue flood alerts and warnings as necessary. https://t.co/SWKeGhiyBh https://t.co/qgqG6FJL3u

We work around the clock to reduce pollution, from monitoring air quality to regulating industries.    

This #CleanAirDay visit the Clean Air Hub to find out more about how you can help tackle #AirPollution too: https://t.co/HZwu2lIpcU https://t.co/nnAKbdarLJ

We've submitted plans for an exciting project to help the Lower Otter Valley adapt to climate change. If approved, the ¬£15 million EU funded scheme will create a stunning new nature reserve. Working with @ClintonDevon and others. https://t.co/Xer8f9JNA1 https://t.co/CW8nVVwsJi

tweets.text: Been looking at @EnvAgencyNW river level graphs for river Yarrow nr #Croston today. Shows role of #CrostonDam. Dam filled; levels through village reduced & record level below the village. Credit to the modellers; designers; builders; forecasters! https://t.co/uwer0aXpgj

Great to be working with @EdenRiversTrust and @NetworkRailLC to deliver this major restoration project in #Thrimby. 

The work carried out here will help restore the River Leith to its former glory, boosting biodiversity in the process for the benefit of generations to come! https://t.co/SHTQ6a7P6g

@MayorofLondon Thanks, promising. 

Please change mind about Silvertown tunnel. redirect funds to save @TfL jobs, bakerloo, bus routes & Hammersmith bridge? 

#planning matters @grantshapps 

We need water desalination plant Beckton @EnvAgency @RobertJenrick @MattHancock @BorisJohnson #thames

tweets.text: The Property Flood Resilience Emag sponsored by @EnvAgency & @floodre has been updated with more case studies where people have installed property flood resilience in their homes, reporting on how installations performed in recent floods. https://t.co/Tvl6R1sjC0

Great work by our installation team yesterday assisted ably by @snuffleapagus and @EnvAgency staff. Synoptic4D radar @Pevensey_Bay ready to collect coastal morphology and hydrodynamics data, part of a @OceanEarthUoS project with @Hachem_Kassem @DrJulianLeyland & @channelcoast ! https://t.co/83D7Qxuk7J

Our fisheries enforcement officers have apprehended a man and seized an illegal fishing net in Sunderland. 

It's part of their investigation into illegal fishing on the North East Coast and River Wear. 

Read more: https://t.co/Vxamp2sqaC

#river #sea #fishing #crime https://t.co/v693r4gUvE

New coastal emergency 999 stickers have been launched along the Redcar & Cleveland coastline in partnership with @EnvAgency @CoastguardNE @RedcarCleveland      - the safety slogan inc. ‚ÄòNo #selfie is worth your life‚Äô. For the full story https://t.co/V4B0DthDHs #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Uk8lOyvW4e

Today is clean air day!

Did you know that our officers take air quality samples which are then given to Public Health England who analyse the samples and work out if there is harm to the public? üí≠

#Teamwork #CleanAirDay @PHE_uk https://t.co/lpPtHaXKuw

Another day another @EnvAgency failure.

Four out of nine water companies in England are now rated as poor when it comes to pollution, the worst result since 2011.

For how much longer I wonder will @MPGeorgeEustice tolerate the incompetence?

https://t.co/X05iHf0Lxu

This #Unblocktober protect your pipes & the environment by never putting the following items down the toilet:

‚õîÔ∏è wet wipes 
‚õîÔ∏è cotton balls, pads or buds 
‚õîÔ∏è kitchen towel - it doesn't dissolve & instead causes blockages

Help to keep our #environment healthy
@stwater https://t.co/VwoFky3bpB

@Marlanmaritime @snuffleapagus @EnvAgency @Pevensey_Bay @OceanEarthUoS @Hachem_Kassem @DrJulianLeyland @channelcoast Looks an interesting project - are you also doing the subtidal measurements or another contractor? I remember it being a very ambitious scheme of work!
#flood alerts and warnings still in place around the country. #BePrepared #floodrisk @EnvAgency https://t.co/K5Zko0W4F0

Listen to our interview on @CValleyRadio about tackling invasive species in Yorkshire. Interesting conversations about Himalayan balsam & Japanese knotweed control in #Calderdale @ScottAPatient @EnvAgencyYNE @YorksWildlife https://t.co/m6jaNpB6hy

@Rushcliffe @NottsCC @andy_jones13 @HighwaysEMIDS @HighwaysEngland @EnvAgencyMids @MyNottingham @AskMyNottingham @H_S_E Now even more vehicles parked on double yellow lines, blocking the pavement and road. Maybe the parking enforcement officer should have issued PCNs this morning? https://t.co/xWfyaBriMx

Listen to this interview by Guy @CValleyRadio with our Sally Kelling, @ScottAPatient & John Cave @YorksWildlife.

They're explaining about the dangers of invasive species & how you can help tackle the problem in Calderdale.

#Calderdale #invasivespecies 
https://t.co/e6gen3mvTo https://t.co/C3WRgRb9Ys

üë∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüë∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èToday we‚Äôre out on site at #Thrimby #Penrith socially distancing with @EnvAgencyNW & @EdenRiversTrust to see the river restoration project that will help improve wildlife & project the West Coast main line from flooding https://t.co/I2TYxnJHd8

Here‚Äôs the river at #Thrimby restored to its natural state away by @EdenRiversTrust from the WCML to make services more reliable.

It‚Äôs been delivered by pooling resources with @EnvAgencyNW 

It‚Äôs a win-win for üêü , #passengers & freight https://t.co/D4hufSMWrD

@moorsforfuture @MoorlandAssoc @peakdistrict @RSPBDoveStone @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgencyMids @LIFEprogramme @YorkshireWater @stwater @pennineprospect @MarsdenmoorNT It's a pity @wrexhamcbc & @NatResWales dont do some work on the tracks over our mountains! https://t.co/PwKi1gyflS

The #FieldTeam recently completed maintenance at a #Reservoir on the #RiverDon.

The large structure is the reservoir outlet. We store water, then release it when the peak of the flood has passed to keep #floodrisk minimised.

üíß This one site stores a huge 679 million litres üíß https://t.co/BhLPcCEwAT

8th Oct Gaywood River gets its daily dose of pollution üí©üíÄüêü üôècan someone please save this Chalkstream @jamesowild @WNGreens @JamesBevanEA @The_WMA @N_Rivers_Trust @jonahtosney @ursula_juta @Dunne4Ludlow @AngliaEnforceEA @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey @TheLynnNews @WestNorfolkBC https://t.co/R5oQge0738

tweets.text:
Exposed peat with nothing growing is an environmental disaster, releasing carbon, susceptible to erosion, contaminating water, and increasing the likelihood of flooding. 
The first step towards healing - spread heather brash (chopped heather) and seed: https://t.co/imBHQjFwtU https://t.co/PZZXmc1W2s
The #forecast has lead us to issue #flood alerts tonight in south #Lancashire #Merseyside #floodaware #PrepareActSurvive keep up to date here https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn https://t.co/LIkPR3yYSB
